RestartInstall: Do you want to restart to install {name} ?
SearchOrDownload: Do you want to search or download it ?
AlreadyRunning: {name} is running. Please close it to continue.
PlayerTooOld: {name} is too old. Version {version} or above is needed.
UpgradeFailed: {name} upgrade failed. Do you want to retry ?
EPGFoundConfidence: {channel} found in the external EPG with {confidence} confidence
Confidence0: 0%: You don't trust the EPG and you'll only get an exact match and often none
Confidence100: 100%: You completely trust the EPG and you'll always get a match even one of poor quality
EPGPreferYes: Yes: Search the IPTV provider EPG first. Use the external EPG only when it fails.
EPGPreferNo: No: Search the external EPG first. Use the IPTV provider EPG only when it fails.
EPGUrlTip: Enter the URL of the external EPG, it should end up with 'xml' or 'xml.gz'
LibmpvTip: Libmpv decodes & renders audio and video. Enable the updates to get the last version optimized for your computer.
ProxyTip: {name} uses a local proxy to intercept all requests to the IPTV provider and inject the 'all' categories and the external EPG
UserProxyTip: Actual user proxy if it exists
